Literature.Title: Diversity, Antimicrobial Action and Structure-Activity Relationship of Buffalo Cathelicidins.
Literature.Author: Brahma B, Patra MC, Karri S, Chopra M, Mishra P, De BC, Kumar S, Mahanty S, Thakur K, Poluri KM, Datta TK, De S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Buffalo erythrocytes:95% Hemolysis=150 µM,Buffalo erythrocytes:60% Hemolysis=60 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=6µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCDC 0111(MIC=6µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MIC=3µM),Bacillus cereus NCDC 0240(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCDC 0105(MIC=50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=0.2µM),Escherichia coli MTCC 0723(MIC=>200µM),Acinetobacter johnsonii NCDC 0072(MIC=200µM)
